title: Trial Marriage Husband: Need to Work Hard - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Adapted to Manhua   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Broken Engagement   Business Management   Celebrities   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Models   Modern Day   Power Couple   Pregnancy   Revenge   Showbiz   Strong Love Interests   Unconditional Love
author: Passion Honey   百香蜜
description:
On the wedding day, her fiancé and his lover had a love affair and eloped. Her eyes were dim, she seized the man in front of the Civil Affairs Bureau.

”To sum it up, your bride is not here, my groom ran off, wouldn’t it be better if we… fight together?”

Before marriage, she said, “Even on the bed, between me and you, there will not be anything!” 

After the marriage, he said, “Do not try, how do you know?”>
